parameters.name: DBInstanceId
parameters.description:
The instance ID.

>  You can call the [DescribeDBInstances](~~86911~~) operation to query the information about all AnalyticDB for PostgreSQL instances within a region, including instance IDs.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The region ID of the instance.

>  You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~86912~~) operation to query the most recent region list.

parameters.name: WorkspaceId
parameters.description: The ID of the workspace that consists of multiple AnalyticDB for PostgreSQL instances. You must specify one of the WorkspaceId and DBInstanceId parameters. If you specify both parameters, the WorkspaceId parameter takes effect.
